snippet.title: THE DARK DWELLERS - Teaser Trailer
snippet.description:
https://store.steampowered.com/app/1771620/The_Dark_Dwellers/

Thrown into a pit and cursed to lives of undeath, one ragtag group of survivors are determined to investigate, explore and root out the cause of this great evil. Take control of the Mortali, the newest member of THE DARK DWELLERS, and attempt to destroy The Maddening Curse. 

Almost exactly a year ago I decided to get back into solo game development and am currently finishing up my second project; THE DARK DWELLERS, which is a fully voice-acted action game/souls-like for PC. I am extremely excited about this release and hope you are too!
